text: [[b]]Lu Qian[[/b]] \\n Swift Bowman \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A deadly hunter, a peerless scout, a loyal subordinate and a quick thinking general all in one - Lü Qian is a consumate commander.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu Shang[[/b]] \\n Magnanimous Inspector \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]To be a paragon of governance, one must always put the needs of both the people and state before all else.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xue Li[[/b]] \\n Diligent Watchman \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]But who watches the watchmen? And who watches those who watch the watchmen? And who watches those who-[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Zhang Ying[[/b]] \\n Niuzhu Protector \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]All great generals must learn that even the staunchest of positions can have exploitable weaknesses.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu Ji[[/b]] \\n Handsome Courtier \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The soothing words of Liu Ji can quell the ire of even an enraged tiger.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER
[[b]]Chen Heng[[/b]] \\n Of Reckless Aplomb \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]There is a fine line between bravado and foolishness.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER
[[b]]Gao Dai[[/b]] \\n Master Historian \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]There are lessons in the past; if we do not learn them, we are doomed[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Xu Gong[[/b]] \\n Resentful Underling \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]One day you'll see, oh you'll see, you'll ALL see![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Xu Zhao[[/b]] \\n Gracious Protector \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Get behind me![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Kuang Gan[[/b]] \\n Pledged and Responsible \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With a family that seems to be a magnet for trouble and peril, the calm and steady Kuang Gan offers a protective embrace.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xie Mi[[/b]] \\n Delightful Courtesan \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The charming Lady Xie practically demands to be made the centre of attention.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Xu Sheng[[/b]] \\n The Insurmountable Bulwark \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]You shall not pass![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Rong Fang[[/b]] \\n Jiangdong Songstress \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Of humble birth, the Lady Rong has adjusted to noble life with gusto and aplomb.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Ling Tong[[/b]] \\n Daring Errant \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]For some men, war is a chance to prove one’s self and seek adventure.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zhu Huan[[/b]] \\n The Dire Enshroud \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Mad? I'm not mad! You're mad! I'll kill you, madman![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Pan Zhang[[/b]] \\n Risk-taking Ambusher \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]I bet you twenty copper coins that I can capture that general![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Xu Kun[[/b]] \\n Intrepid General \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The mighty Xu Kun is the first in the fray, and the last to leave.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ling Cao[[/b]] \\n Swift Boatsman \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]On the volatile waters of the Yangtze, few alive can navigate it with Ling Cao's skill and agility.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Sun Shi[[/b]] \\n Swashbuckling Swordswoman \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This brave lady of the Sun clan is adventurous and more comfortable sailing the rivers, than staying at home playing the part of a noble.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Yu Fan[[/b]] \\n Abrasive Advisor \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Those with sensitive egos should beware of asking advice from Yu Fan. [[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Bu Zhi[[/b]] \\n Expansionist Minister \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]I prefer to call them aggressive negotiations", actually."[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]He Qi[[/b]] \\n Filial and Frugal \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Like a streak of lightning burning across a dark night sky, He Qi's extravagance and grandeur in battle are unmissable and unforgettable.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Gu Yong[[/b]] \\n Of Quiet Humility \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]It is a wise leader who heeds the words of all those in his court, even advisors such as Gu Yong who may not stand out among the louder voices.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Dong Xi[[/b]] \\n Courageous Commadore \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Draw blades and follow me, men! We'll fight them ship to ship![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zhou Bo[[/b]] \\n Defiant Chief \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Get off my land![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yan Lan[[/b]] \\n Yue Dilettante \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Yan Lan has an eye for things of value and worth, be they treasure or talented people.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhuang Zhen[[/b]] \\n Nimble Tigeress  \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The brave Zhuang Zhen prowls through the domain of Jiangdong, keeping a matronly eye on kith and kin alike.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Huanglong Luo[[/b]] \\n Jiangdong Dragon \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With a temper to match his ferocious reputation, this mighty warrior of the Shanyue considers all of the south to be his rightful domain. [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yan Xia[[/b]] \\n White Tiger Cub \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]For one who has clawed his way up the bureaucratic ladder on his own merits, no job is too small for Yan Xiang.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Kan Ze[[/b]] \\n Keen-eyed Attendant \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Not much gets past the vision of Kan Ze, be that the ploy of a great strategist, or a plight of a person in need.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhu Lian[[/b]] \\n Meticulously Organised \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zhu Lian remembers well the principles of her father, and devotes herself to his organised and detail orientated methods.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhu Min[[/b]] \\n Bright-eyed and Open \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The charming Zhu Min is both an excellent orator, and a great listener, making her very popular amongst the court.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Lu Dai[[/b]] \\n Experienced and Dignified \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With age comes wisdom, with veterancy comes experience.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zu Ting[[/b]] \\n The Gentle Ember \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zu Ting seems unassuming and outwardly meek, but this only masks the cinders of a hidden fire within.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zu Cui[[/b]] \\n Moonlit Maid \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Beloved by her father, Zu Cui is treasured by him like a precious gem. The Heavens themselves will not spare anyone who upsets her or breaks her heart from her father's wrath.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ouhou Cai[[/b]] \\n Jiangdong Sword Mistress \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This ferocious master of the blade possess skills so honed and potent, some say that she is a reincarnation of Yuenü of old.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zou Lin[[/b]] \\n Crafty Warlord \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The terrain and climate of Jiangdong provide myriad challenges to northerners who venture south of the Great River. To those whose family have made this land their home for generations, however, such challenges are boons and bounties.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ke Wu[[/b]] \\n Qiang Marauder \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A little bit of treasure in my life, a little bit of plunder by my side, a little bit of copper's all I need, a little bit of lacquer's what I see...[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Dang Lianhua[[/b]] \\n Of SIlken Grace \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The enchanting Dang Lianhua comes from a long line of frontier merchants, and uses those connections to enrich herself and her family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Guo Xian[[/b]] \\n Humble Loyalist \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This one would rather endure a thousand deaths than betray his lord and his principles.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yang Kui[[/b]] \\n Aspiring Cavalier \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This general finds nothing more thrilling and exhilarating than the rush  of charging into battle on horseback.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Hua Ji[[/b]] \\n Aristocratic and Dignified \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]In times of peace, the wise man works for the state. In times of war, he works for himself.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zheng Tai[[/b]] \\n Unswayable Loyalist \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A dying ember can still reignite a fire.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Teng Ling[[/b]] \\n Of Charming Composure \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The level-headed Lady Teng brings a certain calm dignity, that follows her like an aura.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Jiang Gan[[/b]] \\n Of Shadowy Smiles \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The scholarly Jiang Gan masks his true motivations behind gregarious laughter and charming sophistry.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Sima Hui[[/b]] \\n Master Water Mirror \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]So, you wish to know your future? Hohohohohohoho! Good, very good! Yes, yes! Hohohohohoho![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhuge Jin[[/b]] \\n Bookish Scholar \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Having studied history and poetry in years past, Zhuge Jin is a man who appreciates scholarship.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zhuge Dan[[/b]] \\n The Hound of Shouchun \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Every dog has its day...[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Puyang Lian[[/b]] \\n Maternal and Caring \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The generous and tolerant Lady Puyang considers it her solemn duty to ensure all the children under her care grow up healthy, happy, educated and satisfied.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Pang Degong[[/b]] \\n Phoenix Caretaker \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Even those of us with the most potential cannot thrive without a solid foundation and support network.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Qu Chuntao[[/b]] \\n Cruel Diva \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Qu Chuntao will literally trample on others in order to get what she wants.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Tong Jie[[/b]] \\n Of Fierce Independence \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The Lady Tong is a fiery trailblazer, eschewing societal norms and generally being something of a trouble maker, unable to be tied down in one place for very long.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Tong Yin[[/b]] \\n Proudly Passive \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]There are unfortunately some in this world who foolishly squander their wealth and privileges on frivolous and base ends, rather than the betterment of the state.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Ke Ren[[/b]] \\n Prickly Madam \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]How rude! I demand to speak with your Administrator![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Wan Bing[[/b]] \\n Keeper of the Rebellious Flame \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The south shall rise again![[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Cheng Bing[[/b]] \\n Ceremonial Maestro \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]In order to secure heaven's blessings, and guarantee good fortune, rituals and ceremonies must be performed perfectly, and adhere to the and methods traditions of old.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xue Zong[[/b]] \\n Witty and Persuasive \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Using charming rhetoric and humourous irony, Xue Zong guides his lord from taking actions too reckless or risky.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Lai Xun[[/b]] \\n Capable Prodigy \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The hopes of the next generation rest on Lai Gong.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Wu Chen[[/b]] \\n Of Unshakable Faith \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Stay close, my friends, and allow me to be your shield![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Pan Juan[[/b]] \\n Manipulative Seductress \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Why get one's own hands dirty, when a few sweet whispers can persuade some sap to do the deed for you?[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Pan Shun[[/b]] \\n Paranoid Rebel \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lies! Deception! Every day, more lies![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu Ai[[/b]] \\n Frail Maiden \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This lady has the misfortune of having been cursed with a weak constitution and a sickly body.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Li Shu[[/b]] \\n Fickle Renegade \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Our lord has proven incapable! Now it is I, Li Shu's, time to shine at last! Mwahahahaha![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Jiang Qin[[/b]] \\n Valliant Rivermaster \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A reformed pirate, Jiang Qin seeks mastery over sword and scroll alike, and seeks to prove his dominance over any naval engagement.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Liu Ye[[/b]] \\n Methodical Technician \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]*"Set! Loose! Fire the catapults!"[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Liu Du[[/b]] \\n Coolheaded Governor \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]By observing the movements of the heavens, this one can accurately predict the fates of armies, generals, and even kings and Emperors.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Li Yan[[/b]] \\n Logistical Orchestrator \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The line between order and disorder lies in logistics.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Xiang Chong[[/b]] \\n Valiant Loyalist \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Xiang Chong's faith in his ruler is unshakable, and his honour is never at risk of being tarnished.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Liu Ba[[/b]] \\n Economical Maestro \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The very economy of the state dances to Liu Ba's tune.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Wang Xiang[[/b]] \\n Rising Maestro \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Wang Xiang is a nigh-legendary exemplar of filial piety - not that he would ever accept such high praise.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Han Ji[[/b]] \\n Master of Salt and Iron \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]From years of experience, Shan Jing is well aware that only vigilance and military strength can keep the troublesome northern tribes in check.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Nangong Xinyu[[/b]] \\n Maiden of the Mountains \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A princess of a southern hill tribe, Lady Nangong has useful political and familial connections to many chieftains, clans and bands in the mountains and valleys.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Nangong Zixiao[[/b]] \\n Hill Chieftain \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Amidst the hillocks and gullies of the south are countless independent tribes, who reject the rule of the Han.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Pan Jun[[/b]] \\n Pillar of Integrity \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]No matter which lord he serves, Pan Jun remains a paragon of incorruptibility, justice and truthfulness.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Jiang Wan[[/b]] \\n Ingenious Statesman \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]An all around model minister, Jiang Wan's abilities at statecraft are nigh unparalleled.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Jin Xuan[[/b]] \\n Scion of Gold \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Not all that glitters is gold. Sometimes, talent shines even brighter.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Huan Lin[[/b]] \\n Careful Advisor \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Decades of work, and the fate of an entire kingdom, can be undone with a single poor decision. Huan Lin only hopes that his warnings carry weight.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Min[[/b]] \\n Strident Herald \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With a booming voice and undeniable rhetoric, Zhang Min delivers the word of his lord![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Shi Xin[[/b]] \\n Faithful of Shi \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]There must be only total devotion to the cause; anything less is as good as treason.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Shi Yi[[/b]] \\n Frugal and Unflappable \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Humility and modesty are among the key tenets of being a respected Confucian gentleman.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Shi Hui[[/b]] \\n Naively Ambitious \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This one sees only power, and never the way to it.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Shi Fen[[/b]] \\n Father's Favourite \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Among the children of Shi Ci, Shi Fen clearly had his favour and thus was spoiled rotten, ever since she was a young child.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER
[[b]]Huan Zhi[[/b]] \\n The Virtuous Blade \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The wicked cannot escape the sword of judgement.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Ma Liang[[/b]] \\n The Sage With The White Eyebrows \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A wise strategist, keen tactician and excellent diplomat, there is little wonder that Ma Liang and his famous eyebrows are so sought after by warlords and rulers.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Ma Su[[/b]] \\n Vainglorious Protege \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]I'm a genius - oh no![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu He[[/b]] \\n Hapless Heir \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Being a scion to a royal house can unfortunately mean your fate is under the control of other parties.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gao Pei[[/b]] \\n The Bastion of Ba \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As long as Gao Pei still draws breath, the safety of his beloved homeland remains intact.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zhang Song[[/b]] \\n Of Smug Superiority \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Sometimes, my genius...it's almost frightening.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Leng Bao[[/b]] \\n Steel Commander \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Leng Bao is a bulwark on the battlefield - unflinching, impenetrable, and relentless.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Linghu Na[[/b]] \\n Of Steady Composure \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The calming presence of Lady Linghu can help others keep a cool head, no matter what crisis faces them.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Wang Fu[[/b]] \\n Eagle-Eyed Reconnoiterer \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Be cautious, my lords! I have a bad feeling about this![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wang Shi[[/b]] \\n Chengdu Axeman \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A brash and valiant warrior, Wang Shi specialises in fighting in forests and woods.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yong Kai[[/b]] \\n Manipulative Schemer \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With plans upon plans, Yong Kai bides his time, waiting the perfect moment to lay his ambitions to bare...[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Ma Zhong[[/b]] \\n Fleetfooted Lancer \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Inspiring all who follow him, Ma Zhong rushes into the fore![[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER
PLACEHOLDER
[[b]]Liu Mao[[/b]] \\n Sickly Scion \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Every parent laments and wails for a sickly and weak child.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER

[[b]]Huang Quan[[/b]] \\n The Wise Realist \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Although his advice may seem harsh, Huang Quan's words sing with carefully considered wisdom. [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lei Tong[[/b]] \\n Piercer of Defences \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lei Tong does have a knack for breaking through the formations of his opponents, but this comes with impetuous recklessness.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Peng Yang[[/b]] \\n Conceited Talent \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As scholarly and learned Peng Yang may be, his arrogance and smug rudeness puts off colleague and master alike.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wang Lei[[/b]] \\n Defiant Til Death \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When words cannot get through to your lord, sometimes more dramatic action is required.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Wu Yi[[/b]] \\n General who Attacks Rebels \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Traitors and rebels beware, as Wu Yi is commanding the van![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhu Gui[[/b]] \\n Bookish Biographer \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]By penning the histories of local worthies, one can impart wisdom to future generations.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Fei Yi[[/b]] \\n Convivial and Genial Minister \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Fei Yi knows well that a state cannot be ran without happy and loyal friends at his side.[[/col]][[/i]]
PLACEHOLDER
[[b]]Liu Gui[[/b]] \\n Iron Bulwark \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]You wish to invade the lands of my lord? Over my dead body![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Wu Ban[[/b]] \\n Agile Assaulter \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Swiftness is a key tenant of victory, and Wu Ban knows this well.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Ni[[/b]] \\n The Flying Blade \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Heroic and hardy, Zhang Ni is famed as a hero, and has won the respect of even former enemies and barbarians.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Yi[[/b]] \\n The Nascent Inferno \\n\\n General type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]All great generals must learn that even the staunchest of positions can have exploitable weaknesses.[[/col]][[/i]]
